decision_conditions: AMENDED: Condition 5 (Accordance with Approved Plans)

description: Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2019/2314, dated 28/06/2021 (Development of 4 no. new buildings comprising residential units (in addition to those approved under planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883), a basement extension to Block B, flexible commercial uses (Class E) and associated landscaping, access, car parking and other engineering works), in order to amend Condition 5, core layouts, unit layouts, window and balcony configuration, and plant arrangement.
